name: Mankanali Netaji Subhas Social Welfare Society
briefDescription: The concept of netajisvision was involved by the instant of community development programme lunched in this country,which made by the local youth. The association was established in the year of 2008 by amalgamation of different molecular NGO of Bankura District at the state of WestBengal in India,organize and promote self effort,to awaken rural people of fulfill  the aims & object to reconstruct & uplift its economic & other condition of indian people.
